queries.main_leaderboard: SELECT submission_name, ((rationale_score * 0.25 + architecture_score * 0.25 + testing_score * 0.25 + logic_score * 0.25) * red_penalty_applied) AS cis_score, rationale_score, architecture_score, testing_score, logic_score, red_penalty_applied, timestamp FROM results ORDER BY cis_score DESC
queries.security_audit: SELECT submission_name, red_analysis.vulnerability_count, red_analysis.max_severity, red_penalty_applied FROM results WHERE red_analysis.vulnerability_count > 0 ORDER BY red_penalty_applied ASC
